title: Queenme Round Hotfix Rhinestones Glass Flatback Crystals Hot Fix Stones Dazzling Gems for Clothing Shoes Jewelry Fabric Crafts (2880pcs 2.8mm SS10, Jonquil)
features: High Quality: These flatback hotfix rhinestones are made from 5A class quality glass, which is with high refraction rate, appears very shiny and won't change dull. Featured with multifaceted cutting, the hot fix crystal stones keep sparkly and provide the ultra dazzling brightness.
Size and Quantity: This package includes 2880pcs of SS10 Jonquil hotfix rhinestones. The iron on crystals will be packed into a seal plastic bag and we guarantee you will receive an intact package.

Absolute Advantage: With the unique concave back design and German-imported hot fix gray glue, these crystals can be fixed on clothes fabric or any flat surfaces, and hardly come out during washing. The unique concave back can also avoid glue overflow while melting. It will keep your project clean and neat.

Wide Application: Our hotfix crystals have wide ranged usage for artwork designs and production. It’s quite suitable for embellishment costume garments clothes, decorating shoes, hairpin, phone case, books, photo frame, car plate, guitar, violin, doing nail arts and body eye makeup design.

Easy to use: Usually fix by heat pressing ( hot fix ), can also be glued on for its owns flatback base. To hot fix, just use a heat applicator to melt the bottom glue from the front of hot fix rhinestones till the gray glue completely melted and firmly stick on your project. To glue on, apply the clear glue on the back of stones (clear glue NOT included), then stick on your projects.
description: Queenme Round Hotfix Rhinestones Glass Flatback Crystals Hot Fix Stones Dazzling
Gems for Clothing Shoes Jewelry Fabric Crafts (2880pcs 2.8mm SS10, Jonquil)
Wanna make an unique and shiny T-shirt instead of wearing an ordinary shirt?

These hotfix flatback crystal rhinestone will be your choice! Being made from 5A-class quality glass, these sparkly, charming and clear rhinestones withstand long-termuse and won't change dull. Except to embellish your T-shirt, these stones can be used on other clothes fabric or any flat surfaces.  If you are doing a big area project, you can piece the crystals into the design pattern on a transparent sticky paper, then use the iron to get the crystal glued on the T-shirt/ clothes fabric. Note: As the small size of these rhinestones, it might cause chocking hazard or suffocation. Please store in high place and keep away from your child or use under supervision.
